name: INVADERS (itch) (MCSTEEG)
description:
INVADERS -About the game-

INVADERS is a game for the 7DFPS Game Jam where you must fight against  little evil pink aliens to protect Earth!  In the not too distant future, aliens invade earth. The evil aliens are set on one thing, the destruction of mankind. You, and your squad of highly trained soldiers, must defend Earth at all costs.

Equip an assault rifle, heavy pistol, sniper rifle, shotgun, rocket launcher, or even captured alien technology to bring down enemy infantry and aircraft! 

Command your troops in an RTS camera perspective to take control of the battle. Sometimes, your soldiers can reach places you can't! Use them to solve puzzles and support you in battle!

Aliens are much more advance than humans. Their plasma weapons burn through the toughest of armors and their shields block even the fastest projectiles. Use your surroundings , weapons, and squad mates to strategically defeat your foes.

-Features-
  • Fast-paced FPS combat
  • RTS Mode to command your fellow soldiers
  • Online leaderboards for mission scores
  • Dynamic music
  • Bright & colorful graphics
  • Display and sound options
